description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Succession_PoolObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Succession_PoolObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Succession_PoolObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: The Reference ID that specifies a Job Profile Succession Plan.

Succession_Pool_Data.description: Setting this value to true will remove Succession Pool memberships prior to adding member(s)
Holds Reference_ID of Job Profile Succession Plan.
Holds Succession Plan Name attribute value.
Holds Succession Plan Description attribute value.
Holds Succession Plan Inactivate boolean value.
Restricted Succession pool holds a boolean value. This Boolean value is used to specify if the succession plan is restricted or not.
This Boolean value is used to specify if the Succession/Talent pool will be excluded from processing during the Remove Worker from Talent business process
